title: Come see this charming 1 Bed, 1 Bath today! Washer/dryer included!
posting_body: ['Bridgepoint', 'Leasing Office:', '2200 Brown St', 'Waxahachie, TX 75165', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what Bridgepoint has to offer!', "Whether you're looking for your first home or your next home, Bridgepoint Apartments is a comfortable and charming place to be.", 'The relaxed location in Waxahachie, Texas, offers the perfect blend of country-quiet living with city conveniences, including easy access to shopping and dining at the Waxahachie Towne Center, an easy commute to Navarro College and more.', 'We are also located close to Baylor Hospital, SAGU, Historic Downtown, Belk, Target, Starbucks, Shobiz Movie Theater and more!', 'Our community features beautiful landscaping, updated interiors and a newly renovated exterior.', 'With your choice of one- or two-bedroom apartments, we are sure that you will find the perfect place to call home.', 'Bridgepoint Apartments - the lifestyle you desire with the price that you want.', 'Rental Information:', '1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom / 700 sq ft / $1346 - $1649/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 9-Month, 12-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '✓ Air Conditioner', '✓ Carpeting', '✓ Dishwasher', '✓ Linen Closets/Extra Storage', '✓ Pantry', '✓ Refrigerator', '✓ Vaulted Ceilings', '✓ View', '✓ Well-Appointed Kitchens', '✓ Window Coverings', 'Additional Information:', '✓ Bark Park', '✓ BBQ/Picnic Area', '✓ Carport', '✓ Clubhouse', '✓ Covered Parking', '✓ Fitness Center', '✓ Free Weights', '✓ Pet-Friendly', '✓ Sports Court', '✓ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '✓ 6-12 Month Lease Terms', '✓ Beautiful Landscaping', '✓ On-Site Maintenance', '✓ On-Site Management', '✓ Package Receiving', '✓ Planned Activities for Residents', '✓ Public Transportation', '✓ Resort Style Swimming Pool', '✓ Valet Trash Services', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:30 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Facebook:', '<URL>', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Peak Living', '****Prices and availability are subject to change*****', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '4EA4CDA3E6E34C9E']
